article_title: Walmart's Dilemma -- Top Line Good -- Bottom Line Under Pressure

article_metadata.author: Walter Loeb

og.description: Walmart’s second quarter 2015 showed a sales improvement. Domestic net sales increased 4.8% and comparable store sales increased 1.5% in the quarter. Comparable store sales in neighborhood markets increased 7.3% suggesting that customers like to shop in that store format and it is gaining market share. However, domestic earnings were [...]
